mapper.insert: insert into bill (totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, itemcode, isPrint, feecode, isDone, billcat,treatcat) values (#{totalprice}, #{pid}, #{count}, now(), #{isPaid}, #{itemcode}, #{isPrint}, #{feecode}, #{isDone}, #{billcat},'register')
mapper.sql: select billid, totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, b.itemcode, isPrint, b.feecode, isDone, billcat, nm.itemname as itemname, f.feename as feename from bill b join non_medic nm on nm.itemcode = b.itemcode join fee f on f.feecode = b.feecode where pid = #{pid}

select billid, totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, b.itemcode, isPrint, b.feecode, isDone, billcat, m.itemname as itemname, f.feename as feename from bill b join medicine m on m.itemcode = b.itemcode join fee f on f.feecode = b.feecode where pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: select billid, totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, b.itemcode, isPrint, b.feecode, isDone, billcat, nm.itemname as itemname, f.feename as feename from bill b join non_medic nm on nm.itemcode = b.itemcode join fee f on f.feecode = b.feecode where b.recid = #{recid} union select billid, totalprice, pid, count, billdate, isPaid, b.itemcode, isPrint, b.feecode, isDone, billcat, m.itemname as itemname, f.feename as feename from bill b join medicine m on m.itemcode = b.itemcode join fee f on f.feecode = b.feecode where b.recid = #{recid}
